text: Hi All! I'm new here. I am developing my first landing page in HubSpot, and I created my own template and form. My problem is I cannot get the form to show on my page the way I have it designed. When I populate it into my page (via the template I have created)..it loses all styling and does not allow me to edit it in the capacity I wish to. I've looked at a bunch of documentation on forms, and am still stuck. Any advice? Thanks!!
Yessir you can make use of the macro tag and import that into whatever file you want
Hi all, I am new in HubSpot-cms, Please let me know how can we setup multiple websites or domains in single HubSpot account. Please any one help me and share the steps or videos.
